sub_title: Creative Mindset | Social Media | Storytelling | Content Creation | Digital Strategy | Journalism
summary:
Excited to share my journey as a social media manager and journalist with 15 years of experience.

I'm a Senior Social Media Coordinator at ASICS; I manage the global @asicsrunning Instagram account, which I implemented, and the ASICS Europe channels on Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube. I have managed and grown various brands' online presence in the past years through strategic social media campaigns and engaging content creation.

I moved to the Netherlands in 2016, specifically to the picturesque city of Delft. My first experience was in a startup in Rotterdam called Sweek, where I was a Marketing Manager for 2,5 years. I was responsible for social editorial calendars, content creation for several platforms (i.e. social channels, blog, email marketing), influencer marketing, community management, graphic design, customer support, sales, and business development. It was a great opportunity to do what I love, start my career from scratch in a foreign country, meet nice people, and develop new skills.

After this versatile position in the country that I decided to call home, I had the opportunity to work for Oliver Agency inside Diageo, one of the largest beverage multinational companies in the world, as the Social Media Manager of the two most prominent brands of the premium portfolio: Ciroc and Tanqueray. 

I have graduated in Journalism in Brazil, where I worked for worldwide advertising agencies, such as Edelman and Wunderman, and also for the largest Brazilian publishers and news portals (iG, UOL, Editora Abril, and Globo Condé Nast).

I've already worked with brands such as HP, AMD, Symantec, Norton, Disney World, Bosch Power Tools, Petrobras, Always, TRESemmé, Dove, Honda, Cîroc, Tanqueray, Gucci, ELLE, InStyle, Glamour, Microsoft, Vivo, Hershey's and Bauducco.  

Skills:
► Social media and creative strategy
► Content marketing and creation 
► Influencer marketing
► Partnerships with third-parties  
► Visual guidelines and identity
► Copywriting (Portuguese & English)
► Video editing 
► PR
► Business Development
► Voice-over

#SocialMedia #Journalism #ContentCreation #Storytelling #DigitalMarketing #Communications

profile_positions.description:
• Development, implementation and management of ASICS EMEA and global ASICS Running social media strategy.
• Editorial calendar management for all types of content across social media platforms.
• Measurement of the most important social media KPIs to measure the campaign success.
• Copywriting.
• Assets design and creation for different purposes and channels.
• Video editing.
• Keep abreast of the latest social media best practices and technologies.
• Social media best practices education and learning sessions for athletes, marketing and trade teams.
• Collaboration with internal departments to make sure various products, campaigns, and events are featured on social media.
• Amplification of the organic content through paid social campaigns.
• Paid social campaigns for Twitter.
• Event coverage.
• Community management.

Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, Snapchat, and Pinterest.

Tools: Sprinklr, Iconosquare, Photoshop, Adobe Premiere, Facebook Ads Manager, Smartly.

profile_positions.description:
Sweek is a mobile platform that allows anyone to read, write and share stories all over the world. Free for all users, the platform is currently available in 14 languages and allows publications in over 60. 

• Development of brand awareness, online reputation and content management.
• Content creation, curation, and management (images, videos, and copy)
• Community development and expansion.
• Response to comments and customer queries in a timely manner.
• Research of organizations and individuals online to identify new leads.
• Graphic design: creation of visuals for social media and marketing campaigns.
• Identification and development of online marketing opportunities.
• Partnership with publishers, organizations, companies and influencers. 
• Development and execution of influencer marketing strategies and campaigns.
• Translation and transcreation: English-Portuguese or Portuguese-English.
• Paid social: Facebook and Instagram campaigns.

Results: Turned the Portuguese-speaking countries market into the third biggest market of the company – behind the Spanish/LATAM and English ones. Created and managed well-succeeded campaigns that inspired the other markets.

profile_positions.description:
• Copywriting, editing, and publication of engaging content for various social media channels, including Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

profile_positions.description:
2011: Celebrity hard news and quizzes for LoveTeen website, whose focus was teenage girls.

2012: Brand content for a Summer marketing action created by Ruffles lays, owned by PepsiCo, and Capricho magazine.

2012: Articles for Capricho website, the most traditional and famous magazine for teenagers in Brazil. Launched in 1952, it was the first Brazilian magazine for women and it still is the number one in the teenage market.

2012: Branded content for Gucci 500 advertisement, published in Brazilian Elle magazine.

2014 - 2015: Branded content for TRESemmé, Always, Dove, Natura, O Boticário, Honda Fit 2015, Gallo, Liza and content for the portal "De Carona com Elas", sponsored by Petrobras.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Reporter

profile_positions.description:
Content creation for the Fashion Websites Department: Elle, Estilo (InStyle), Manequim (the first fashion magazine in Brazil, launched in 1959), Boa Forma (beauty, health, and fitness), and ModaSpot (an extinct website known for being the first Brazilian portal of fashion hard news).

I was responsible for producing beauty and fashion articles, picture galleries, events coverage – São Paulo Fashion Week, ELLE Summer Preview, Fashion Rio, InspiraMais (Components Design and Innovation Exhibition), Couromoda and Première Vision –, writing fashion show reviews (including New York, London, Milan and Paris fashion weeks), and organizing all the national and international news that would be part of the daily agenda for each website.

I interviewed – in Portuguese, English or French – important professionals, such as fashion designers Gloria Coelho, Reinaldo Lourenço, Pedro Lourenço, Walter Rodrigues, Valdemar Iódice, Alexandre Herchcovitch, Clô Orozco and Nicole Miller; Brazilian fashion experts, like Mário Mendes, Gloria Kalil, Costanza Pascolato, Erika Palomino and Lilian Pacce; models Karlie Kloss, Candice Swanepoel, Lindsey Wixson, Erin Heatherton, Olivia Wilde, Izabel Goulart, Viviane Orth, Shirley Mallmann, Carolina Thaler, Renata Kuerten (and much more); bloggers Betty Autier and Chiara Ferragni; and Italian stylist Elisa Nalin.

Also, it was part of my job to edit the home pages of every website, and create content for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, MMS (Multimedia Messaging Service), and QR Code.

http://elle.com.br
http://revistaestilo.com.br
http://manequim.com.br
http://boaforma.com.br
profile_positions.title: Reporter

profile_positions.description:
Freelance reporter and Social Media copywriter and analyst.

2011: Social media content for iG Gente Twitter and Facebook, the celebrities' news section of the portal. The results were so positive that I also became responsible for creating content for iGirl and iG Jovem Twitter and Facebook pages, both dedicated to teenagers.

2011: Concert reviews, published in the Culture section of the portal.

2012: Event coverage for Último Segundo, the hard news section, and iG Gente, the Celebrity news section, about Prince Harry's charity polo match at Monte Mor, the countryside of São Paulo, Brazil.

2013 - 2014: Articles for iG Beleza (beauty section), iG Comportamento (behavior section) and iG Jovem (pop culture/ teenager section).
profile_positions.title: Reporter | Social Media Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Internet Group do Brasil (iG) is a Brazilian Internet service provider that owns and operates a web portal.

iG Jovem/iGirl: As an intern in 2008 – and then hired as a reporter in 2010 –, I was responsible for creating content for iG Jovem and iGirl, two websites focused on teenagers. Besides editing the home pages, I wrote articles (about behavior, health, beauty, fashion, celebrities, culture, and sports), concert or book reviews, and interviews. It was also part of my job to make video reports, create content for mobile (SMS), and cover events, like São Paulo Fashion Week, Rio Comic Con, Disney Soccer Cup, Graffiti Fine Art International Bienal, Street Biennale, and street art vernissages.

I had the opportunity to interview a few international celebrities, like Demi Lovato, Jonas Brothers, Drake Bell, Emily Osment, Belinda, Kevin McHale (from Glee), and Matthew Lewis (from Harry Potter), besides comic book writers/artists Milo Manara and Melinda Gebbie.

iG Delas: As an intern in 2009, my job was about helping all the editors who worked for the Women's Section: fashion, beauty, gastronomy, decoration, bridal, and behavior. I also worked for iG Estilo, a former website dedicated to the male audience, by editing articles and the home page or writing automobile reviews. It was a great challenge at the beginning of my career since versatility was one of the main points: one day creating a Gucci fashion show gallery and, in the other, discussing Los Angeles Auto Show releases, for example. 

iG Comida: As a Gastronomy intern, I was responsible for the content creation. I used to write articles about restaurants and different kinds of cuisine by interviewing famous Brazilian chefs, and food or wine experts.
profile_positions.title: Intern | Reporter

profile_positions.description:
Editora MOL is currently the world's largest social impact publishing house.

Reporter responsible for the Walmart blog. 
• Creation of articles about technology, gastronomy, behavior, health, decoration, art, fashion, beauty, sports, and tips in general.
• Goal: provide information and drive sales at the same time.
• Brainstorming, research, and pitch of ideas for posts.
• Creation and publication of articles and news stories with the reader’s and client's perspective in mind.
• Maximization of site traffic by utilizing SEO keywords.
• Better understanding of the audience via blog comments and analytics.
• Industry trends verification and research for possible opportunities to attract new readers and create more engaging content.

More:
2012: Articles for Nossa Raia, a corporate communication magazine for Droga Raia drugstore employees.

2012/2013: Articles about behavior, health, and gastronomy for Sorria magazine, available at Droga Raia stores throughout Brazil. The profits are turned into charity for GRAACC (Grupo de Apoio Ao Adolescente e À Criança com Câncer), which treats children and teenagers with cancer, and Ayrton Senna Institute, whose goal is to create opportunities for children and young Brazilians, in cooperation with businesses, governments, municipalities, schools, universities, and NGOs.

http://www.revistasorria.com.br
http://www.mundowalmart.com.br
profile_positions.title: Reporter

volunteer_experiences.description: Teto is a nonprofit organization that mobilizes young volunteers to fight extreme poverty in Latin America by constructing transitional housing and implementing social inclusion programs. I attended the massive poll, one of the first steps before the construction. I came into houses, in a favela at the extreme North Zone of São Paulo, to talk to these families, ask questions and understand their necessities. From this action, the NGO decides which families are more in need.
